Literature.Title: Synthetic peptides that form nanostructured micelles have potent antibiotic and antibiofilm activity against polymicrobial infections.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2023;120:e2219679120
Literature.Author: Chou S, Guo H, Zingl FG, Zhang S, Toska J, Xu B, Chen Y, Chen P, Waldor MK, Zhao W, Mekalanos JJ, Mou X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=>64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>64µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=>64µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>64µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Cytotoxicity=16µM)
